tags.description: Tags is a map that categorizes data or tracks references in external systems. The tags names should be consistent and descriptive, e.g. fb_user_id:123, salesforce_customer_id:456.

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on patternProperties keyword
tests.rust_error: Additional properties are not allowed ('123fb_user_id' was unexpected)
tests.python_error:
'123fb_user_id' does not match any of the regexes: '^[a-zA-Z_]{1}[\\w\\.:-]+$'

Failed validating 'additionalProperties' in schema['properties']['tags']:
    {'type': 'object',
     'patternProperties': {'^[a-zA-Z_]{1}[\\w\\.:-]+$': {'type': 'string',
                                                         'pattern': '^[\\w\\/\\.:-]+$'}},
     'additionalProperties': False,
     'description': 'Tags is a map that categorizes data or tracks '
                    'references in external systems. The tags names should '
                    'be consistent and descriptive, e.g. fb_user_id:123, '
                    'salesforce_customer_id:456.'}

On instance['tags']:
    {'123fb_user_id': '123',
     'salesforce_customer_id': '456',
     'product_category': 'electronics/computers'}
